post.body: Welcome new members! Thanks for following along...
Welcome new members! Thanks for following along...
Thanks lady, I'm on board now. Say hey to PR for me.
Hey Holly, Steve payne in San Antonio...how do you welcome folks to your site and bunch them together with their links?its cool
Dude, how'd you keep a straight face and not scream obscenities at her? You've the strength of a superhero! http://twurl.cc/8ru
Shout out to my new friend! Thanks for following along...
Shout out to my new friend! Thanks for following along...
Thank you Sharyn, I can always count on you for support and energy! YOU ROCK!
Let's not comment too vociferously on 47 year old...as I resemble those remarks. (I swear, snot nosed kids think they know it all
That's Mr. Old Man, to you. Kid's...sheesh.
Why compete? Age and treachery will overcome youth and exuberance everytime...if I can stay awake. Kick butt today!
Great day of classes today, check it out at http://twurl.cc/8rs About to take a nap, 'cuz I'm an old man, and then do some shopping...wee!
Ahh, at home by the fire with Bella & Bunny (my kitties) and my wife while the temp drops. It's beginning to feel a lot like Christmas...
When I left for the gym at 5 am this morning it was 58 degrees. It's 39 now at 4:45 pm...in San Antonio, Texas, and the wind is blowing COLD
Home for the day. Great set of classes this morning. Brutal to be a member. I can smell fat loss in the air...http://twurl.cc/8ru C-ya!
About to throw some pig ribs on the grill and watch a little football. Getting ready 4 the week and looking to Christmas http://twurl.cc/9f3
Happy Sunday, folks. Lovely day in San Antonio. New blog post http://twurl.cc/8ru Have a blessed day.
Short day at the gym today. Check out my dancing skills at http://twurl.cc/8rs to see me with my wife and the kitties. I move like butter!
Just watched "Fred Claus" which of course made me cry. I'm very easily moved...you see. This time of year is a very emotional time, ya know.
Between bootcamp sessions. Just had my Friday tacos: machacado! Yum! Short day today, and a nap is coming. http://safatloss.com/blog - C-ya!
Just posted a new video on my Youtube site about Oprah. Watch it and leave a comment http://twurl.cc/9f3
4:10 am, can't sleep. Excitement fills my head...again. I don't have to go to work, I get to. The life of a fitness pro http://twurl.cc/8ru
Cold weather in San Antonio, Tx! Predicted 27degrees tonite. I'll be by the fire in a few with my kitties. I luv 'em - http://twurl.cc/8ru
Finished training for the day. Sitting here with my little furry buddy, Bella, and she's purring as I stroke her back. She's so cute.
Just sent out my weekly newsletter, updating the blogs and drinking my morning java by the fireplace with my kitties. Good stuff indeed.
Just wrote a press release about Oprah. Check it out here: http://twurl.cc/94x
Jesus Christ is Lord. Be blessed of God, one and all, on this most sacred day of days! BTW, I got a MagLite & I luv it! Yippee!
Merry Christmas, y'all, from East Texas!
FINALLY made it to the in-laws. Love abounds as the Christmas spirit pervades every facet of our being. Be blessed, one and all. Shalom!
Just returned from a 4 day successful hunting trip. Packing to head to East Texas for Christmas. Merry Christmas, ya'll! http://twurl.cc/8ru
Last day of work then off for a week. Hunting for 3 days, then to the in-laws for Christmas where Mom will pamper me cuz I'm so sweet. Yea!
Ain't cedar pollen season great? Tryin' to turn th drain pipe that was my nose off. We'll talk later, Right now, Kleenex is my best friend
By the way, check out my "Dancing with the Stars" skills! http://safatloss.com/blog
4:19 a.m. and I'm awake and ready to blast this day into the stratosphere. training will be short, sweet and to the pt, like my attn span!
I'm a tired boy. Been up since 3:15 a.m. Good day, got a lot done. Go to court tomorrow to settle a foundation dispute on my home. C-ya thin
Time for some lunch and a nap. We old men need our moments of quiet solitude to recharge those ancient Duracells. http://twurl.cc/8ru
5:15 am, been awake for about 2 hours so far. Body is tired, mind is rockin'...what a combo. Sent out latest newsletter, now to more writing
New blog post with respect to the average American and fat loss, not just San Antonio. Check it out http://safatloss.com/blog/ Thanks, babe!
